text: I'm not great at Facebook. Hope that's okay to admit.
Turns out I'm a creep on Facebook.
I didn't realize that. I thought I'd find out that I'm way cool.
Turns out, no, I'm a weirdo.
I do stuff on there that I've never done in my regular life.
Not in maybe the way you think.
Because, it's just I do stuff on there that I don't do in my regular life.
My regular life I've never wandered into a stranger's house
and pulled down their photo albums
and feverishly look through every picture.
"Look at that! Look at that!"
"What are you doing here?"
"Don't worry I'm a friend of a friend."
Just kinda look on through
"I'm going to keep that one. I'm going to keep it."
[Laughter]
What a creep!
The creepiest Facebook thing I did was
visit an ex-girlfriend's Facebook page.
That's like the electronic version of driving past your ex-girlfriend's house
Did you ever do that when you were younger
and didn't have any self-control?
Just driving "Why am I doing this? I shouldn't be doing
this is a bad idea. What if she sees you?
There she is!" [Vroom]
And you just speed away.
She's like, "Steve, is that you?"
"Haha! Yeah you caught me.
I'm just passing through the cul-de-sac.
[Laughter]
I'm on my way. Yeah it's faster.
I don't know how. Don't ask."
[Laughter]
So, I type this girl's name in the
search bar, press return, only to realize
that is not the search bar and her name
is now my status update.
[Laughter]
Just her name. Just--
I didn't do it on a computer. I did it on my phone.
Which is when I found out the mobile Facebook
didn't have remove status update option.
I just had to sit there while all my friends liked it and commented on it.
I'm just sweating.
"Stop it! Stop commenting!
It's trending!
[Laughter]
It's getting popular."
She's gonna see. And of course she did see.
She was like, "What are you doing, Steve?"
I'm like "Nothing! Nothing...
I was hacked! My account was hacked!
It's that weird virus
that types in your ex-girlfriends name
It's going around. Be careful!"
Felt like I had to type fake status updates
just to make it believable.
Like, "Lose weight using this one weird trick!
Wrap your belly in cellophane!
Look at the before and after before and after!"
